verses.verse: (For the choir director; on the Gittith. A Psalm of David.) O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> our <S%H136>Lord,<s%> <S%H4100>How<s%> <S%H117>majestic<s%> is Thy <S%H8034>name<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>earth,<s%> <S%H834>Who<s%> hast <S%H5414>displayed<s%> Thy <S%H1935>splendor<s%> <S%H5921>above<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens!<s%>

From the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of <S%H5768>infants<s%> and <S%H3243>nursing<s%> <S%H3243>babes<s%> Thou hast <S%H3245>established<s%> <S%H5797>strength,<s%> <S%H4616>Because<s%> of Thine <S%H6887>adversaries,<s%> To make the <S%H340>enemy<s%> and the <S%H5358>revengeful<s%> <S%H7673>cease.<s%>

<S%H3588>When<s%> I <S%H7200>consider<s%> Thy <S%H8064>heavens,<s%> the <S%H4639>work<s%> of Thy <S%H676>fingers,<s%> The <S%H3394>moon<s%> and the <S%H3556>stars,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> Thou hast <S%H3559>ordained;<s%>
<S%H4100>What<s%> is <S%H582>man,<s%> that Thou dost <S%H2142>take<s%> <S%H2142>thought<s%> of him? And the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> that Thou dost <S%H6485>care<s%> for him?
Yet Thou hast <S%H2637>made<s%> him a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H2637>lower<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> And dost <S%H5849>crown<s%> him with <S%H9202>glory<s%> and <S%H1926>majesty!<s%>

Thou dost make him to <S%H4910>rule<s%> over the <S%H4639>works<s%> of Thy <S%H3027>hands;<s%> Thou hast <S%H7896>put<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3605>things<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> his <S%H7272>feet,<s%>

The <S%H6833>birds<s%> of the <S%H8064>heavens,<s%> and the <S%H1709>fish<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> Whatever <S%H5674>passes<s%> <S%H5674>through<s%> the <S%H734>paths<s%> of the <S%H3220>seas.<s%>
O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> our <S%H136>Lord,<s%> <S%H4100>How<s%> <S%H117>majestic<s%> is Thy <S%H8034>name<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>earth!<s%>
